=========================
Project Task Send By Mail
=========================

This module was written to extend the functionality of project tasks and allow
you to send the task order by email.

Usage
=====

To use this module, you need to:

* Go to a Task Order.
* Click on the button Send by Email.
* And click on the button Send.

.. image:: https://odoo-community.org/website/image/ir.attachment/5784_f2813bd/datas
   :alt: Try me on Runbot
   :target: https://runbot.odoo-community.org/runbot/140/9.0

check there if your issue has already been reported. If you spotted it first,
help us smash it by providing detailed and welcomed feedback.
